titleStmt.title: Reasons taken out of Gods Word and the best humane testimonies prouing a necessitie of reforming our churches in England Framed and applied to 4. assertions wherein the foresaid purpose is contained. The 4. assertions are set downe in the page next following.
titleStmt.author: Jacob, Henry, 1563-1624.

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name from STC.
